text: Shahriar (; also Romanized as Shahriyar, Shahryar) is a new city under construction in the Central District of Tabriz County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran. Because of the large population of Tabriz metropolis, in the new city will be built apartments and villa homes. Shahriar is Located in Tabriz-Ahar road. Predicted population of 170,000 and its area of 1,500 hectares. ==Notes== ==References== * * Category:Populated places in Tabriz County Category:Cities in East Azerbaijan Province Category:Planned cities in Iran
title: Shahriar, East Azerbaijan
